author: lgo
msg: Refer in the comments of the conflict eol-style tests in update_tests.py
to their equivalents in merge_tests.py and visa versa.

author: lgo
msg: New tests for testing eol-style handling during merges. Both
tests were copied from update_tests.py and adapted (updates
the eol-style of the conflict files.
(merge_eolstyle_handling): New test, checks if merge handles
and propchanges of svn:eol-style correctly during merge.
This test is marked XFail for now

author: lgo
msg: Followup to r21275: we need the date of the first revision
if we want to check out that revision.
(checkout_peg_rev_date): calculate the date of the first revision,
wait till the next minute and then checkout with the original date.

author: lgo
msg: (checkout_peg_rev_date): Fixed incorrect issue number in comment.

author: lgo
msg: Prepare fix for issue #2556: abstract root folder checks in svn_path_is_root.
Add support for 'X:/' as a root folder on Windows.
(brane & ehu basically helped me write the patch)
(svn_client_commit4): make sure to abort when the iterating through the
parent folders passese the root folder.
(svn_path_is_root): New function. Tests for all forms considered canonical
root specs on the platform at hand ('/', 'X:/' etc.)
get_path_ancestor_length): Support the new type of root path on Windows,
mostly by replacing direct comparisons of path and '/' with a call to
(svn_path_canonicalize): don't strip the trailing slash if the path is
(test_is_root): New test for validation of svn_path_is_root.
test_basename, test_remove_component): add extra cases for 'X:/'.
